**Granted Powers:** Add Gather Information and [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) to your list of cleric class skills.

**City Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Rooftop Strider (Spell)|Rooftop Strider]]****:** Move across uneven surfaces with ease.

**2** **[[City Lights (Spell)|City Lights]]****:** Absorb nearby light to release as blinding flare.

**3** **[[Winding Alleys (Spell)|Winding Alleys]]****:** Trap foe in phantasmal maze.

**4** **[[Commune with City (Spell)|Commune with City]]****:** Learn about city.

**5** **[[Skyline Runner (Spell)|Skyline Runner]]****:** You can walk normally on any city surface.

**6** **[[City Stride (Spell)|City Stride]]****:** Teleport between two cities.

**7** **[[Urban Shield (Spell)|Urban Shield]]****:** City grants cover to you, not to enemies.

**8** **[[City's Might (Spell)|Cityâ€™s Might]]****:** Gain enhancement to Str and Con, damage reduction, while in city.

**9** **[[Animate City (Spell)|Animate City]]****:** City structures attack, slow down enemies.
